Subbed Projects.Show Name: Ano Hi Mita Hana no Namae wo Bokutachi wa Mada Shiranai. Movie

Good Comments: Regular. Other than the first two lines in the movie and Yukiatsu's comment about the girls taking his picture, I didn't notice other mistranslations.
Don't know anything about their past work, but this release was A+ material. Also love how they referenced UTW's original releases to make sure for consistency with their releases.

Mistranslating "Once we cross that bridge" (ano hashi wo watareba) into "Once he stops running" despite a big bridge being shown. That was enough to make me laugh out loud and quit. People liking this really have no clue.
Good job. Good subs and video quality ^^
The type setting was really good.

They did a great job subbing this movie.

Excellent throughout.
good subs
Bad Comments: For the first two lines, the literal translation would be "once the sound of those feet stops" or something along those lines, which implies when he stops running. It's not wrong, just not literal. As for Yukiatsu's comment, he's referencing his letter.

AMAZING translation

The first line is "ano hashi wo watareba, mietekuru" which is literally "if (we) cross that bridge, (we) will see (it)". So it is definitely a mistranslation!! Didn't watch their release so can't comment on anything else.

i don't know any of there works but they did great here no complain.
